website_summaries.verdict: These superior soft treats are perfectly bite-sized for cats of all ages and loaded with two real meat sources per treat as well as lots of flavor.
pros: Deboned chicken and duck are the first two ingredients
No artificial colors, flavors, or preservatives
cons: No chicken-free option for avoiding poultry allergies

customer_reviews.title: **DON'T FEED YOUR CAT BLUE BUFFALO!**
customer_reviews.text: one of my cats developed hypercalcemia (high Calcium levels) on Blue Buffalo. After spending over $1000 in vet bills, the breeder tells us that some of her clients had the same complaint about Blue Buffalo. we checked it out on the internet and discovered they had the same problem with dogs a few years back. it was traced to Vitamin D Toxicity. well i cant be 100% sure if its the Blue buffalo food or Blue buffalo treats we were giving them. If you love your fur babies **DON'T FEED YOUR CAT BLUE BUFFALO!**
customer_reviews.author: andrew chase yngsdahl

customer_reviews.title: My cats absolutely REFUSED to eat these!
customer_reviews.text: Boy, was I shocked when I opened these Blue Wilderness Chicken & Turkey Recipe cat treats and both of my cats refused to try them. I'm not sure I can describe the look they gave me. It was something like "Yuck, you've got to be kidding me." One of my two cats is more like a dog--he'll eat anything, and he wolfs his food down. He wanted nothing to do with these treats from Blue Wilderness. I always order them something when I order from Amazon, but these were a huge disappointment for them and for me--they weren't free.
customer_reviews.author: C Wheeler

customer_reviews.title: None of my 4 cats would eat them
customer_reviews.text: How is it possible that out of my 4 cats, NONE of them ate these treats. The treats are square-shaped and have a weird texture. I put a treat down in front of them and they sniffed it and walked away. If 4 cats won’t eat them, I don’t know which cat will. I will stick with catnip-flavored Greenies and seafood medley Temptations treats. My cats go Gaga over those. These Blue Buffalo treats were a complete bust. I am returning them and asking for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: J M

customer_reviews.title: Expired in a month from now. Not good
customer_reviews.text: These made my kitten feel ill. They expire October 21, 2018. I purchased the batch of 3 packages last week and they're hard as rocks. If my cat needs a visit to the Veterinarian, this won't make me happy. Usually she gobbles this brand like candy. Not this time. Sad you sell short-dated food.
customer_reviews.author: Pen

customer_reviews.title: Smells terrible, but cats loved them
customer_reviews.text: These treats may not smell the best to me, but the cats don't seem to mind. When I opened the package, they both came running for a snack (we call them snacks not treats) and practically took off my finger trying to gobble these up. I have one cat that I am trying to fatten up and another cat on diet (these are not the best for a dieting cat, but I only give her one compared to the two her sister gets). I like to stick to hard treats as they help clean teeth as they chew, but I felt mixing in the occasional soft treat would be quite okay.
customer_reviews.author: Nichole

customer_reviews.title: Cat won't eat.
customer_reviews.text: I'm sure this is a good quality cat food, but in five years of using various brands, this is the first kind my cat won't eat. We thought if we ignored her, she would eventually give in. But at 3am, when you have a paw poking your cheek every 20 seconds, guess who gives in. Worse part, I bought three cases, so I wouldn't have to worry about it for a while. Another con, it has a strong odor. When I walk into my house, I can smell it. Another con, I bought pate', but this is more like runny gravy style.
customer_reviews.author: Sherri

customer_reviews.title: Smells terrible, but the cats love
customer_reviews.text: These treats may not smell the best to me, but the cats don't seem to mind. When I opened the package, they both came running for a snack (we call them snacks not treats). I have one cat that I am trying to fatten up and another cat on diet (these are not the best for a dieting cat, but I only give her one compared to the two her sister gets). I like to stick to hard treats as they help clean teeth as they chew, but I felt mixing in the occasional soft treat would be quite okay.
customer_reviews.author: Nichole

customer_reviews.title: It's ok
customer_reviews.text: Bought on sale bc I was looking for better quality treats. 3 out of 4 cats like it but 2 of them are rescues and they're not picky. 3rd one has a good temperament and will eat most foods. 4th one loooves chicken but refused to eat this unless really hungry. She just kinda spits it out sometimes and will swallow if I repeatedly give her this treat. She's a princess and gets real chicken regularly so maybe this just wasn't up to par. Think I will continue to look for other treats that the whole fam will enjoy.
customer_reviews.author: TB

customer_reviews.title: Acat and Owner Both Pleased With This Brand
customer_reviews.text: Am switching my cats treats and decided to give these a try. Sam needed a few seconds to decide if he'd give the Blue Wilderness a try - he'd b3n getting crunchy all grain treats previously. I've purchased 4 flavors - he has no preference. I was curious as they all smelled pretty much the same and looked like each other. Still have no idea why there is no noticeable difference especially when sniffed. Have noticed Sam seems satisfied with 3-4 of these little pieces vs wanting as many of the old grain treats as he could con me out of.
customer_reviews.author: Roberta Rankin

customer_reviews.title: Waning approval
customer_reviews.text: Blue Buffalo makes amazing high quality food that our critters love, however the treats leave something to be desired. These are rather well enjoyed when freshly opened, but as time goes on interest wanes until no one is excited or interested to partake. Ultimately these need to be mixed with other more desirable treats simply to not make waste and get them consumed. There are better options at better price points available on the market.
customer_reviews.author: M&N

customer_reviews.title: Loved by my picky cats
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 cats, aged 6 years and 14 months. They both LOVE these treats and are willing to do stupid human tricks to get them. As opposed to the 9 other types of treats I have tried which didn't go over well with either (or both) of them. Word of warning, the treats DO match the color of hardwood floors... but they are solid enough not to go squish if you accidentally step on them.
customer_reviews.author: Andyi

customer_reviews.title: The absolute BEST cat treats!
customer_reviews.text: Our cats will choose these treats over any others we offer them. They now know that when I open the cabinet door, they are getting a treat and come running. I have never seen cats eat treats so quickly! I tend to give them several treats each time, so knowing that these have good, natural ingredients makes me feel so much better about that! While they are expensive, knowing they're good quality makes it worth it for my pets sake.
customer_reviews.author: Brandi

customer_reviews.title: 5 Stars - Total Awesomeness!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased the "Blue Buffalo Wilderness Cat Treats - Chicken and Salmon" so that our beautiful and precious Kitty Cat, i.e. Noelle could have a more nutritious treat that was a healthier alternative (no fillers or byproducts) and she absolutely loves these treats! Noelle took to these treats right away and she actually sits at attention near the cupboard where we store them (telling us that she deserves a yummy treat) and we happily oblige. Yes, we absolutely recommend these treats to any and all kitty cat owners. Thank you goes to the Seller for such an amazingly awesome product! Thank you also goes to our Trustworthy Amazon.com for a wonderfully awesome treat at an unbeaten price-point!
customer_reviews.author: Robert Kerby

customer_reviews.title: My cat gobbles these up
customer_reviews.text: I've recently switched my cat to an all raw food diet, and I've become much more conscious about what I'm feeding him based on my ongoing research about a cat's diet. I decided to lean more towards food that has little to no fillers, less or no grains, etc. Same with his treats. I found these, as this brand has been highly rated to me before. He absolutely loves them and goes insane whenever I even touch the bag of treats.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Scherer

customer_reviews.title: Kitten goes nuts for these!
customer_reviews.text: Blue Wilderness is checking off boxes in my books - I have both their dry kibble, canned food, and these treats. My kitty LOVES all three, and that's even with quality, high-protein ingredients like I prefer. I've been using these to train my kitten and let's just say he's learning fast! I just ordered the 8oz version in the salmon flavor so we shall see if he feels the same about those!
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Too bad - I'm always looking for healthy treats for her
customer_reviews.text: I gave these to my kitty and she walked away!! The piglet who eats anything turned her nose up at them. Too bad - I'm always looking for healthy treats for her, but I won't be buying these again
customer_reviews.author: Suze

customer_reviews.title: Too many ads!
customer_reviews.text: My cat liked the cat treats, hated the food. Worst part is that after I ordered from Chewy, every time I go on the internet I am inundated with Chewy ads. I mean they literally fill the screen and keep popping up again and again when I'm trying to read a news story. This is overkill. I hope that by NEVER ORDERING FROM CHEWY AGAIN (which I vow never to do again), they will eventually stop the ad over-kill. If a product or service is really top notch, it should be able to sell itself and not need constant pushing. SO ANNOYING!
customer_reviews.author: Louise Clay

customer_reviews.title: Our 2 cats LOVE these chews
customer_reviews.text: My younger cats (1.5 years and 11 months) absolutely love these treats. We keep them in the fridge and they go nuts every time we open the refrigerator door. I originally got them for them as kittens because I didn't want to give them crunchy treats and they love the soft chews, especially cold! Our senior cat (13 years) has zero interest and only likes the crunchy Temptations treats. I like the flavor variety for this pack.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney and Cameron Payne

customer_reviews.title: Suprising
customer_reviews.text: I have never found a cat treat that my cats didn't enjoy. They were excited at first, they knew it was treats...until it got into their mouth. Now I personally don't know what this tastes like and will not go so far as to find out, but neither of my cats (and admittedly one of them is picky) enjoyed these treats. I believe 1 out of 6 given were eaten.
customer_reviews.author: Krystal

customer_reviews.title: 3 out of 5 cats likes them.
customer_reviews.text: These don’t have a strong smell, which is great. 3 out of 5 cats like them with a caveat. My kitten ate them just fine. My senior cat took a bit to chew them. My 3 year old cat had to have them broken in half. I’d suggest ripping them in half for all cats though. They aren’t the best shape for a treat. They are flat rectangles.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Nebel

customer_reviews.title: I'm tempted to eat them myself, they smell that good
customer_reviews.text: Three cats. One will eat anything, one ate one piece and walked away. The third cat, Merlin, the one I'm trying to tempt to eat more, thinks they're marvelous. Yay. He votes the flavor at five. I give five stars for value because Merlin likes them, and he's worth it. I gave five stars for scent because I'm almost tempted to eat them myself. Update: two cats still like them. The third not only doesn't like them, but if I put them in front of her, she skewers me with a very baleful stare (srsly, you want me to eat *this*?). Fortunately she likes hairball treats, so I am not in permanent disgrace.
customer_reviews.author: Lin D

customer_reviews.title: Price is good.
customer_reviews.text: My picky cat will eat these also they are a bit more rectangular in shape so my cat with some vision loss can see then end of them and take them from your fingers, whereas the square ones she can't see enough of it and she's afraid she's going to bit you. Also, they are softer for cats that might have some dental issues.
customer_reviews.author: sheila

customer_reviews.title: Cat approved.
customer_reviews.text: Pros: My kitty loves them, healthier option than a lot of other treats and even some foods so no guilt in giving her a few too many ;) Cons: Any time she hears heavy plastic crinkling now she's all in my face thinking treats are soon to come
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Patterson

customer_reviews.title: Staple Treats
customer_reviews.text: Cat loves these in all flavors. He snubbed Temptations brand treats early on. I keep this brand and Wellness Kittles treats on-hand at all times. I rotate through available flavors of both brands when it’s time to reorder. I have Amazon subscribe & save set to keep rotation of flavors going without having to think about.
customer_reviews.author: MH

customer_reviews.title: Great treats!
customer_reviews.text: Have had several flavors and our older cat really enjoys the chicken and turkey treat and the chicken and duck treats. Soft chews, smell good, and best of all, our older cat loves them. He hears me coming with the bag and his head perks right up! We are a fan of these treats.....well, at least the kitty enjoys eating them! I just like seeing him happy.
customer_reviews.author: SusanManke

customer_reviews.title: Meh...
customer_reviews.text: I’m trying to give this product a neutral review with the 3 stars. This is supposedly a good brand, but two of my four cats spit them out. Surprisingly, one of them was the treat whore of the bunch, but maybe it just wasn’t what he was expecting. The others seem ‘lukewarm” about these treats. But hey, they’re cats.
customer_reviews.author: Mark 1

customer_reviews.title: Cats love this!
customer_reviews.text: My cats freak out when I give them these treats, and they are picky. I also had to find a brand that didn't make them barf. Grain free has been our go-to now. One of my cats has stomatitis so he has very sensitive gums and teeth. These are nice and soft so they're even pleasant for him to chew. (They are slightly crumbly.) These are perfect.
customer_reviews.author: MaryBeth Stevens

customer_reviews.title: My felines stuck their nose up at it then scratched the floor
customer_reviews.text: My cats left the Blue Wilderness kibbles in their dish even when it was first introduced to them by mixing it in a ratio of 1/3 Blue Wilderness with 2/3 of their regular dry kibble. After that whenever offered to them, they would scratch the floor so as to bury it. Any cat owner will recognize this action! I ended up by offering the bag to a Shelter.
customer_reviews.author: Linda C.

customer_reviews.title: Super finicky kitty is crazy for them!!!
customer_reviews.text: My finicky kitty was used to only crunchy treats so I wasn't sure if she'd take to these. But, she loves them. I put the old crunchy and these soft treats in her treat dish and have noticed that she eats all the blue buffalo and leaves all the crunchy ones!! Definitely on auto order every month!!
customer_reviews.author: Lorelyle

customer_reviews.title: He likes them, he really like them 😊
customer_reviews.text: My cat Diego loves these things. My cat is very picky about his food. I decided to try a new snack For him and these arrived today. I gave him a couple and barely chewed them, I gave him some more and he gobbled them down. He is currently tapping the bag for more😂 I’ll definitely buy more for him.
customer_reviews.author: Shawndra B.

customer_reviews.title: My cats wouldn’t eat them
customer_reviews.text: Obviously I didn’t taste the treats but neither would my cats. Both of them sniffed them and then looked up at me like “what is it?” Normally they love their treats and beg for more. Not sure why they wouldn’t eat them, even when I tried mixing them with their usual treats.
customer_reviews.author: negreenbee

customer_reviews.title: My cat is obsessed with these treats
customer_reviews.text: I've never seen anything like it. I'll be innocently sitting, and suddenly I'll hear a bunch of racket. It's my cat, trying to tear into these treats! I've found the bag on the floor, riddled with teeth marks. I don't know what the heck Blue Buffalo is putting into their treats, but I have to say the cat loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Ronni Davis

customer_reviews.title: They sent me expired treats.
customer_reviews.text: Was past the expiration date printed on bag. I only realized this after I opened it and saw the hardened bits that used to be kitty treats.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: This order is really dry but she still loves them.
customer_reviews.text: My Princess is crazy for these treats! She gobbles them down! BUT. The ones I got from Subscribe and Save are DRY! She still loves them but I'm really disappointed in the new order. I'll keep buying them because she loves them. I don't notice any odor from the bags, so I have to give 5 stars for that.
customer_reviews.author: Sue K.

customer_reviews.title: My cats weren't crazy about them
customer_reviews.text: One of picky and the other loves pretty much any treat but both cats do not care for these :( But it may just be my cat, not sure. I purchased because it said they were soft, I was going to use to hiding medication. They are thin, flat squares so just a heads up will not work for that!
customer_reviews.author: RachLab18

customer_reviews.title: Only treat my cat will eat
customer_reviews.text: Packaging is sturdy with a good seal. The product must be tasty if this is the only cat treat my cat will eat!! Glad for healthy ingredients too. I bought the little cans of wet food of the same brand because my cat loved this brand. My cat loves the canned food too!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Deliciously great
customer_reviews.text: I have to say my cat loves these treats! He is usually not a fan of soft treats, but he eats these with a quickness. They are nice sized and could even be broken in half to stretch the bag. You get a decent sized bag for the price. I will definitely order again.
customer_reviews.author: Tasha Espenschied

customer_reviews.title: Cat loved the flavor, but had difficulty finding the snacks
customer_reviews.text: My cat loved the snacks when he was able to find them, but for whatever reason wasn't able to locate them as easily as most food. He had difficulty locating them both visually and by small even with the snacks presented right in front of him. He did, however, recognize the packaging. When presented with the bag and a pile of snacks, he'll try to tear the packaging open rather than eat the exposed snacks. Strange phenomenon I've never encountered with other cat food/snacks.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Blue Buffalo Chicken & DUCK
customer_reviews.text: Thought that the cats would enjoy something different, but NO!! They will NOT eat these. Also the pieces are so small -- guess that is apre po for the money.... What a loss! If your cats eat ANYthing, they may eat these. My cats are not usually that picky, but.... WOW.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cats cry for this stuff
customer_reviews.text: All 3 cats really loved this but I have realized after they try anything from this brand they never want to try a different brand or go back to their old food, so keep in this mind unless your prepared to keep spending the money for this treat or thier foods. But all cats are different
customer_reviews.author: Erik Martinez

customer_reviews.title: My cat is picky so won't eat them
customer_reviews.text: I don't think it's a bad product. It's just not one my picky cat will eat. I usually try to keep a couple different products & flavors around. So far she's about 50-50 on what she'll eat. She has ignored these every time I've given these to her.
customer_reviews.author: Greg R.

customer_reviews.title: Great treats
customer_reviews.text: Can't vouch for the flavor personally, but my cats can't seem to get enough. They don't eat fish cat food often, mostly because I loathe fish, but they gobble these up. Same for the scent, I find it somewhat strong, but thankfully not overly fishy. Value was great. I like to mix it up with treat textures, so these are a good addition.
customer_reviews.author: VirginianHannah

customer_reviews.title: My cat can't get enough
customer_reviews.text: My kitten loves these snacks! She goes crazy as soon as she hears me grab the bag. I give her just a few everyday when I get home from work. I have gone through 3 bags or so and she has loved every flavor. They have a very strong smell but you' can't smell them through the sealed bag. I know cats can be very unique. My cat loves these snacks and I would definitely recommend giving them a try.
customer_reviews.author: drew

customer_reviews.title: Not my cats!
customer_reviews.text: Sadly I bought different flavors thinking what a great treat for my cats, but they wouldn't touch them. None of my 5 cats wanted anything to do with them. I can understand, they look like little pieces of rubber! I passed them to my sister's dogs who were happy.
customer_reviews.author: MommySan

customer_reviews.title: A true treat
customer_reviews.text: Our cat doesn't care about people food, and doesn't even get excited about wet cat food. But she loves these treats so much that we give her a good amount every noontime like a little "lunch," lol. She likes the duck and salmon flavors equally.
customer_reviews.author: aj

customer_reviews.title: It was under $4 but ...
customer_reviews.text: Cat seems to enjoy it. Texture is pretty decent with a good amount of moisture. Feels like a soft-baked cookie. only problem that I have is that the item is very small.. i know it's under 4 dollars and all but I felt like , really.. this small?
customer_reviews.author: J from k

customer_reviews.title: These must be delicious.
customer_reviews.text: My cat, El, LOVES these treats. She is fairly picky, so that is saying something. She eats Blue Wilderness food, so I thought I'd give these are try. We keep them in a cabinet, and any time anyone opens ANY cabinet, El comes running full speed. Needless to say, we will keep these on hand. Great product from a great company.
customer_reviews.author: jamie

customer_reviews.title: Product received dried out
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased this product before because my cat LOVES these treats. However, the last order I received, the product was so dried out it looked like cardboard. The cat won't even go near it. Annoying. It wasn't a huge amount of money, but it's so disappointing,
customer_reviews.author: Practical Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Not great
customer_reviews.text: Cat doesn’t care for these. Our cat isn’t picky at all and loves treats and often begs for anything. She just didn’t care for these. She ate a couple since they were brand new and different. Then refused. Glad they were cheap.
customer_reviews.author: S.S.

customer_reviews.title: My cats hate it. Same cats that think their butt is delicious
customer_reviews.text: My cats are not very discerning when it comes to taste & flavors but they will not touch these treats. The main reason I bought soft treats instead of crunchy was to hide their medication in it. But the purpose is defeated since they regard it with disdain
customer_reviews.author: J. Naik

customer_reviews.title: Cats love them, owners don't
customer_reviews.text: My cats loved these! I bought several bags, only to be horrified by the reviews on the ingredient quality and safety standards. My cats lives are not worth risking for cheap treats. I will miss these, but I'm not buying them again.
customer_reviews.author: GB

customer_reviews.title: 3 Picky cats
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my daughters three picky cats. This product wasn't just one cat watching the other and then trying a taste. They all went nuts! The three girls stalked their owner to find out where these delicious treats are hidden, but can't open a top cabinet yet ha.
customer_reviews.author: zandora

customer_reviews.title: My cat loves them...
customer_reviews.text: My cat eats this brand in dry and soft food so I figured we would try out the same brand in treats. He loves them! I really appreciate that they're soft and not chewy, which my cat also prefers. Will buy again - in other flavors as well.
customer_reviews.author: Alison

customer_reviews.title: Tasty cat treats at a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.text: My cat really enjoyed these treats! I had to recently switch my brand of cat treats as they were discontinued, so I was worried if he'd like these, but he did! They are made with quality ingredients and they are moist to help his senior teeth. I'll buy them again!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My neighbor's cat loved them.
customer_reviews.text: This review is for a friend, I thought I ordered the crunchies as my cat will not eat soft treats, he's such a punk. So I gave it to my neighbor and her cats love them. I have purchased the crunchies which my cat loves. But at a pet store.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon B.

customer_reviews.title: Cats love them...
customer_reviews.text: My cat absolutely goes crazy for these treats, not sure what they put in it to make them go bonkers. They only issue I have with them is sometimes they comes very soft and moist and other times they come dried and hard. My cat prefers them soft and moist so its a little hit or miss on when you get them how they will be.
customer_reviews.author: Tommy Boy

customer_reviews.title: Great value! Half the price as local chain stores.
customer_reviews.text: My cat is very particular about his treats and he loves these! They’re a good source of added protein and they are healthier than what you can get to the store. They are also half the price than what I would pay at the local chain store.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie S.

customer_reviews.title: Our cats love them!
customer_reviews.text: Our cats prefer soft treats to crunchy and they love these! I went with the chicken and salmon flavor because some of the other flavors had bad reviews. Our cats love these and the generous size bag should last a long while!
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: I cannot attest to the actual flavor but my cat really like the treats
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the chicken & salmon treats for our cat and he really like the ones that we gave him after we received them. I like that the first and second ingredients is chicken & salmon.
customer_reviews.author: Nomore MS

customer_reviews.title: Best quality tasty treat leaving my cat wanting more.
customer_reviews.text: My car absolutely loves these treats and I feel amazing knowing my cats getting the best quality treats. They don't use any meat by product and my cst genuinely looks forward to me opening the treat packet. A little pricey but worth it knowing your cats getting the best. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Deandra Janice Dsouza

customer_reviews.title: The cats love these!
customer_reviews.text: MEEEOW! They said! The cats love these, what else can I say! There seems to be no negatives; these are a soft treat I have never purchased before, and am glad I did. I will repurchase.
customer_reviews.author: SomeDude68

customer_reviews.title: Not liked by cats
customer_reviews.text: I was trying to find a snack for my cats that was made in the USA, was considered healthy and that my cats would like. Unfortunately, my cats will not have anything to do with this.
customer_reviews.author: K. Coady

customer_reviews.title: Cats enjoyed it
customer_reviews.text: Great cat treats. There's no odor, it's made in the USA and it's much more affordable than the filler crap you see in the stores. Plus it's a soft treat, which cats seem to enjoy.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: Great soft food
customer_reviews.text: These treats work well for my older cats who have problems with hard, dry food. I give them a few of these treats in between meals and they’re fine until they are fed next. They love the taste of these.
customer_reviews.author: Libby 23

customer_reviews.title: Simon says no.
customer_reviews.text: I liked the price and the quick delivery. While the product promised top ingredients and the treats appeared fresh, my cat didn't like them. She gave them a sniff and a lick then just walked away. What more information is needed?
customer_reviews.author: Michala W

customer_reviews.title: Cats love them
customer_reviews.text: My cat love them! They do have a strong smell, but that is probably why my cats love them so much. They are picky with treats but love these. They are soft. Good pricing too!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My cat wouldn’t eat them!
customer_reviews.text: We had to toss them, guess my cat doesn’t like fish?? What cat doesn’t like fish? I won’t dock the company completely cause maybe my cat is picky. But we had to toss them
customer_reviews.author: Review King

customer_reviews.title: Cat's like them
customer_reviews.text: Can't comment on the taste, as I'm not that hungry, but the Cat's do like them and I think Blue Wilderness is producing a good safe product for our pets. Hope that faith isn't misplaced.
customer_reviews.author: dan m

customer_reviews.title: My cat has horrible teeth so he can only have moist treats
customer_reviews.text: My cat has horrible teeth so he can only have moist treats. He loves these, and I use them for training. (Yeah, cat training! He can sit, sit pretty, spin, and high five... so far)
customer_reviews.author: flapflapglide

customer_reviews.title: To my surprise the back says best by FEB 17 2018
customer_reviews.text: I bought these treats today for my girl. To my surprise the back says best by FEB 17 2018. This is disappointing and a waste a money because I don’t feel great giving my kitty something that has expired.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Waddell

customer_reviews.title: My cat loves it
customer_reviews.text: My cat loves the food from this brand in general and this product in particular. These treats are always met with excitement and loud purring. And for this price, you can't go wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: They have helped medically also along with their prescription diet. Thank you.
customer_reviews.text: We love them. I TRAIN WITH THEM. I bought them one time and my kittens tore into their bags and ate the entire thing; one each. There are two boys. They love them so much. It improved my clicker training 89%. Now they run to the clicker. I definitely love these nutritious snacks for my boys LAZARO Y ELIZAO. THANK YOU VERY MUCH.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer F.

customer_reviews.title: You've just GOTTA try these!
customer_reviews.text: These are Blue Buffalo's most delicious flavor! I've tried the trout ones, but they're a little salty for my taste. These chicken ones taste like real damn chicken! I drop them in a cup of chicken broth and have myself a feast! Definitely recommend during the Thanksgiving season!
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Smallwood

customer_reviews.title: Not sure what to think really
customer_reviews.text: My cat wasn't a fan but maybe yours will be. I wouldn't necessarily not recommend it based on my cats taste. My cats kinda a jerk about food. He's overly picky and kinda ungrateful at times.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Gruner

customer_reviews.title: Picky cat loves these!
customer_reviews.text: These are the only treats my picky kitty will eat. He turns his nose up at temptations, pounce, you name it, I’ve given it to a friend or thrown it out.
customer_reviews.author: Countess Anastasia Beaverhausen

customer_reviews.title: Love this brand
customer_reviews.text: This is in no way reflective of the actual product. My cats LOVE LOVE LOVE Blue Wilderness dry food. But they just didn't like these treats. It's an amazing product line so your cat(s) may love them! Just give them a shot. Now my aunt's cats LOVE them. Mine wouldn't eat them at all. Had to Dyson them up. As always, YMMV
customer_reviews.author: drpicard

customer_reviews.title: Kitty loves em!
customer_reviews.text: Got these on sale - great deal and value for a relatively high-quality treat. Kitty loves 'em. I do wish the ingredients were a little more organic, and I'm not a fan of added salt, but otherwise I give these a big thumbs-up!
customer_reviews.author: Authentic Minerva

customer_reviews.title: At first he didn't seem to like them, but after I let him sniff them ...
customer_reviews.text: My cat loves these. At first he didn't seem to like them, but after I let him sniff them a bit he goes crazy for them. When I grab the bag he sprints over and gets all excited, then I'll put a treat in his crate so he goes in there. Then I hide a few treats around my apartment and he runs around hunting for them!
customer_reviews.author: Joshua P.

customer_reviews.title: Not for us
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately my cat hated these. After many tries to get her to take them the dog discovered the bag and ate them all so it wasn't a total loss 🤣
customer_reviews.author: WiseSnapple

customer_reviews.title: cat didn't care for it
customer_reviews.text: cat didn't care for it and it wasn't until after i purchased this that i found out this brand has had a number of recalls in the past so i probably won't get it again just to be safe.
customer_reviews.author: vcw

customer_reviews.title: Cat likes them
customer_reviews.text: Have no idea of flavor but my very senior picky cat (20 +) really likes them. I like the convenience of subscribe & save no hunting them up at the store
customer_reviews.author: Lady Michigan

customer_reviews.title: My kitties favorite snack
customer_reviews.text: The best bribery tool. The treats have a soft texture. My kitties will hunt down the bag. I give them these treats when are super good or after I bathe them. Lol
customer_reviews.author: selenalc

customer_reviews.title: a hard to find item
customer_reviews.text: I have a cat who can not eat anything with much fish or fish oil, or any crunchy food or treats.. These treats have chicken and turkey as the first ingredients and are also soft. Wonderful for an after dinner treat or during those times when our cats are getting restless. 2 or 3 and they are satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Carol K

customer_reviews.text: Two of my cats love these almost to the point of being aggressive and the other two prefer temptations. I like the ingredients of this significantly better.
customer_reviews.author: Paul M.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!!!
customer_reviews.text: So much better for my oldre cat, Jack. Betternutrition without fillers and chemicals, like in other brands, that cause inflammation and are bad for his arthritis and kidneys. Good price. Quick delivery. Will definitely buy again!!!🐾🐾
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Bad batch? Who knows
customer_reviews.text: I thought I was doing the right thing by buying this "healthy" "natural" product for my cat. After 2-3 days of treats she began vomiting. This went on for another 2-3 days until I finally figured out it could be the treats. Threw out the treats and my cat was back to normal in 24 hrs. Bad batch? Who knows, not taking any chance.
customer_reviews.author: Julia

customer_reviews.title: cats hate
customer_reviews.text: I thought would give them healthy treats-even if they cost more.My 2 boys won't touch them-totally walk away from them.Back to Temptations!!
customer_reviews.author: baiba sheridan

customer_reviews.title: Cat's won't eat these
customer_reviews.text: I know this brand is supposed to be better nutritionally for my cats but they refuse to eat them. This is a first on cat treats. They are also not eligible for return.
customer_reviews.author: KT

customer_reviews.title: Cats love them
customer_reviews.text: I have 4 cats. And I bought some Blue Buffalo cat food and treats. The cat food is not to their liking at all. (had to get refund). But the treats are a big hit. My cats love them. Only wish they were a little cheaper so I could get a bigger bag. (Not sure it even comes in a bigger bag. it should.)
customer_reviews.author: Sandpines

customer_reviews.title: Size issues
customer_reviews.text: The treats are thin and flat, the kitties have trouble getting them up into their mouths and they are really too small to be hand fed. Disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Irene

customer_reviews.title: Most of my cats wouldn't touch these
customer_reviews.text: Only one of my four cats liked these treats, so I won't buy them again. I wish they had been more popular since they are much better for the cats than the cheaper varieties of cat treats. I believe it was the soft texture that turned off the other three cats (including the obese cat who rarely turns her nose up at anything that even resembles food).
customer_reviews.author: schnappsersTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: nope
customer_reviews.text: so i have a bengal kitten. he eats blue buffalo kitten food so i thought i'd buy some treats for him too. he refuses to eat them. good ingredients buy a waste of my money. i will NOT buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah S.

customer_reviews.title: 1 outta 3 ain't bad.
customer_reviews.text: 1 cat loves it - other 2 not so much. They say cats tend to like things by smell first. Guess that's the answer to this puzzle.
customer_reviews.author: Ida Grant

customer_reviews.title: No thanks
customer_reviews.text: My cat didn’t like these at all and she loves like anything that’s edible. Also I heard blue buffalo stuff could cause like terrible sickness to our pets so needless to say I stopped giving them to her and will never buy from them again.
customer_reviews.author: Audiandi

customer_reviews.title: My cats loved these
customer_reviews.text: My cats, 3, liked these. My older cat(15) really liked them and meowed like crazy to get more. The price is comparable to cheaply made cat treats.
customer_reviews.author: LINDSAY CANNON

customer_reviews.title: Were lots of other choices available!
customer_reviews.text: Amazon gave me opportunity to try these! But unfortunately my cat didn’t like them for some reason. But did find treats she loved!
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful stinky treats
customer_reviews.text: My cat loves these! I've been using them to teach her a few basic tricks. She likes them enough to humor my attempts, anyways. They do have a strong smell and since they're soft, the smell will stick to your hands but it's worth it for a happy cat that high-fives me.
customer_reviews.author: Wolfiri

customer_reviews.title: Cats love these soft treats!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for my mother's two cats. When I stop over at her house they have their eyes on me, as I keep them on top of her refrigerator. As soon as the cats see me head that way they are jumping up on chairs to make sure they get a treat, one of the cats will even leap up on top of the refrigerator to make sure he gets his treat first!
customer_reviews.author: paintkarz

customer_reviews.title: MEOW!!
customer_reviews.text: I can actually get my cat to do what I want when I show her this bag. She usually turns her nose up at treats. But this must taste like candy to her! She has a delicate stomach and so far she doesn't throw these up when I give them to her. The bag seals really well. The treats are slightly moist and don't dry out in the pouch. I will definitely get these again.
customer_reviews.author: Woman in a Strange Land

customer_reviews.title: Cat Loves them
customer_reviews.text: Cat loves them. We give him 2 at a time and no more than once a day. He hasn't thrown them up so that's always a plus.
customer_reviews.author: MommaHippo

product_meta.title: Blue Buffalo Wilderness Chicken & Turkey Grain Free Cat Treats
product_meta.description:
Flavor Name:Chicken & Duck| Size:2 ozCats of all ages can’t resist BLUE Wilderness soft, meaty treats made with more of the protein they were born to love. These tender morsels of real meat feature two favorite feline flavors in one tasty treat, like chicken and salmon or chicken and duck. So cater to your cat’s natural cravings with these scrumptious, grain-free treats.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
BLUE Wilderness cat treats are: 100% grain-free, Made with real chicken and duck. Free from chicken, poultry by-product meals, artificial flavors and preservatives
feature_bullets: STARTS WITH REAL CHICKEN AND DUCK: BLUE Wilderness cat treats are meat-rich, soft treats made with more of the tasty chicken and duck cats love
GRAIN FREE CAT TREATS: Wholesome treats made without the grains that contain gluten
NATURAL AND HEALTHY: At only 1.5 calories each, these irresistible cat snacks are the perfect reward for felines of all ages
NO CHICKEN (OR POULTRY) BY-PRODUCT MEALS: Plus NO corn, wheat, soy, artificial flavors or preservatives
Contains (1) 2-oz bag of Blue Buffalo Wilderness Grain Free Soft-Moist Cat Treats, Chicken & Duck

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
